page.title: 14ST DAVID'S CHURCH
page.content: St David's Church (built 1933) is in the Parish of Monkton, Rev Roger Williams, Vicar. Sunday services are 11.15 am Holy Eucharist, 2.30 pm Sunday School, 6.00 pm Evensong first and third Sundays in the month. The Sunday School has 25 members and the teachers are Mrs Skelton, Mrs Holloway and Miss Ruth Howells. In 1985 there are 82 members on the Electoral Roll and the Churchwardens are Mr Peter Luff (Vicar's) and Mr Ken Evans (People's) The Youth Fellowship meets every Wednesday in the Church Hall at 7 pm. The Mothers' Union meets monthly and the Presiding Member is Mrs Olwen Williams. Caretakers are Mrs Lloyd (Church) and Mrs Greenslade (Hall). Organists are Mrs Brickle and Mr Scourfield. This year, in July, the Church has its first Flower Festival.
